Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Subject: Manuscripts--Arab countries
Title: Exhibit Collection of Near Eastern Manuscripts, 1492-1848
Description.contents: Collection consists of illustrated and illuminated manuscripts such as a Qur'an, others with elaborate sarlaubs or lacquered covers, a rare text by Nasir al-Din al-Tusi, and a rare illustrated treatise by Ja`far ibn Abi Ishaq Kashfi with lacquered covers.Materials in this collection are primarily in Arabic, with some in Persian and Turkish.
AltTitle.other: Exhibit collection of Near Eastern manuscripts|~|Exhibit Collection of Arabic, Persian and Turkish Manuscripts|~|MS Collection 1656
Description.adminnote: Cataloging note: For manuscripts (not book covers) use AltID format:MS 1656/[MS number]e.g. MS 1656/17
